results.title: Metformin: new applications for an old drug.
results.text_hl: There is evidence of the beneficial effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colorectal cancer@@@, early-stage @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Urethral_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014523 @@@urothelial cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Hematologic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D019337 @@@blood cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Melanoma @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@melanoma@@@, and @DISEASE_Bone_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001859 @@@bone cancer@@@, suggesting @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a potent anti-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ agent.

citations.NLM: Naseri A, Sanaie S, Hamzehzadeh S, Seyedi-Sahebari S, Hosseini MS, Gholipour-Khalili E, Rezazadeh-Gavgani E, Majidazar R, Seraji P, Daneshvar S, Rezazadeh-Gavgani E. Metformin: new applications for an old drug. J Basic Clin Physiol Pharmacol. 2022 Dec 7;():. PMID: 36474458
citations.BibTeX: @article{36474458, title={Metformin: new applications for an old drug.}, author={Naseri A and Sanaie S and Hamzehzadeh S and Seyedi-Sahebari S and Hosseini MS and Gholipour-Khalili E and Rezazadeh-Gavgani E and Majidazar R and Seraji P and Daneshvar S and Rezazadeh-Gavgani E}, journal={J Basic Clin Physiol Pharmacol}}

results.title: Effect of diabetes mellitus and metformin use on oncologic outcomes of patients treated with radical cystectomy for urothelial carcinoma.
results.text_hl: Effect of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use on oncologic outcomes of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with radical cystectomy for @<m>DISEASE_Urethral_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014523 @@@urothelial carcinoma@@@.

citations.NLM: Rieken M, Xylinas E, Kluth L, Crivelli JJ, Chrystal J, Faison T, Lotan Y, Karakiewicz PI, Sun M, Fajkovic H, Babjuk M, Bachmann A, Scherr DS, Shariat SF. Effect of diabetes mellitus and metformin use on oncologic outcomes of patients treated with radical cystectomy for urothelial carcinoma. Urol Oncol. 2014 Jan;32(1):49.e7-14. PMID: 24140245
